name: Wordeous
summary:
Can you play a game with thousands of people? With Wordeous you can! Wordeous allows you to play with your friends or audience. If you are a streamer on Twitch you can play Wordeous with your audience. Thousands of people race to guess the "Wordeous" and win! Wordeous is a fun game that will increase interactivity of streamers with audience. If you're ready for a fierce competition with random game cards in different categories and challenges, let the game begin!
Wordeous is a card game in which you try to explain the "Wordeous Word" to your audience without saying the banned words. Wordeous uses Twitch Chat integration which allows you to receive your audience's answers simultaneously. After you login to your account, you are all set to start a new game with many different categories and hundreds of words!

Wordeous is a multiplayer, co-op game that requires a Twitch account. The player explains the “Wordeous” and your friends and/or audience try to guess the Wordeous by writing their guesses to your Twitch channel’s chat. You can moderate your own match or you can play with your moderator. If you like to play with your moderators, they need to buy a copy of the Wordeous too, however the others who tries to guess "do not" need to buy a copy! You don’t need to be a streamer to play the game, every Twitch account has a chat panel which can be used to play Wordeous!

The scoreboard system allows you to see your most successful viewer of the last game or all games. You and your viewers gather points according to both your and your viewers performance.

Wordeous allows you to have a highly interactive and fun time with your audience.
